name: Rechargeable Motion Sensor Closet Light, Rechargeable Battery Operated Ceiling Light Wireless, 500LM Wireless Motion Activated Light for Shower Stairs Hallway Pantry Porch Garage, 5000K
short_description: Rechargeable Motion Sensor Light - No need to purchase batteries! The wireless rechargeable light features a built-in 10000mAh rechargeable battery, which can be effortlessly charged using the included USB cable. The wireless motion-activated rechargeable light can be fully charged within 12 hours and has a battery life of approximately 90 days 2 Modes - In [☀DAYLIGHT] Mode, the light is active all day, responding to movement. The motion detector automatically turns on within 9-16 feet and turns off after 20 seconds of no motion. Switch to [☾NIGHT] Mode, activating the light in low-light conditions. It won't turn on if enough ambient light is detected. Enjoy the convenience of this versatile rechargeable motion sensor light 500 Lumen Bright Wireless Ceiling Light - This bright rechargeable battery-operated light lasts for over 30,000 hours. It spreads across a wide area of 300 sqft. The frosted LED light cover is designed to soften the light and create a gentle ambiance. Whether it's for your ceiling, closet, shower, stairwell, garage, porch, hallway, or shed, this wireless motion-sensored light is the perfect lighting solution Easier Installation of Wireless Ceiling Light - Enjoy the convenience of this wire-free motion-activated closet light. Whitepoplar ensures effortless installation with a comprehensive installation guide. It comes with a bracket and mounting hardware, allowing you to easily install it yourself within 8 minutes. Say goodbye to complicated wiring and hello to quick and hassle-free installation After-sales & Support - Whitepoplar provides a 12-month support. If you encounter any issues with our motion sensor rechargeable battery-operated ceiling light, such as missing accessories or other concerns, please don't hesitate to catch us. We are committed to resolving the problem until you are fully satisfied Indoor battery-operated lights for closet shower garage stair hallway motion sensor light rechargeable motion activated light indoor wireless ceiling lights without wiring no electric motion sensor Activated Wardrobe lamparas Motion sensor ceiling led light battery operated rechargeable indoor closet lights usb wireless light motion activated battery powered bathroom garage led light inside shower stair lighting outdoor hallway porch

name: STAR-SPANGLED 3 Pack 7” Motion Sensor Lights Indoor Battery Operated, Stick on LED Light for Closet, Stairs, Under Cabinet, Cool White
short_description: Motion Sensor and Light Sensor: Our cordless under cabinet lights auto turn on when human motion is detected within 120 degree and 16 ft in a dark or low-light environment, and auto turn off after no motion is detected within 20 seconds Ultra-high Quality Light Source: 8 pcs 0.5W 140 Lm/W Ra 90 LEDs output 80 lumens with high CRI. Uses 80% high light transmittance lens, our under counter lights offer higher luminous efficiency, ensuring superior brightness while consuming less power Adjustable Lighting Angle and Soft Lighting: Our closet lights have a 90 degree rotating light bar, you can adjust the light bar up and down to expand the lighting range as needed. With anti-glare panel, it can provide soft lighting to protect your eyes Battery Operated: Each night stair light is powered by 3 AAA batteries (not included). Wireless lighting, uncomplicated and safe, no worries about the risk of electric shock to children. To save power, it won't turn on if there's enough light in the area Split Design and Easy Installation: Just slide it, Our motion sensor light indoor is easy to remove and reinstall when the battery needs to be replaced. Customized ultra-adhesive pads ensures a stable installation and can be easily mounted on any surface

name: EZVALO 6-Pack Under Cabinet Lighting with Charging Station, 2000mAh Rechargeable Wireless Motion Sensor Lights, 3 Color Temps, Dimmable, Timer, Magnetic, with Remote Control for Kitchen, Closet, Stair
short_description: 【Upgraded Motion Sensing & 3 Modes】Upgraded with more responsive motion sensing, these motion activated under cabinet lights turns on when your hands are full. [Day Mode] responds to motion in any lighting, perfer for cooking or cleanup. [Night Mode] work only in darkness, perfect for late-night use without turning on overhead lights. Both modes sense motion within 120° and 9–16 ft, and shut off after 20 seconds. [Always On Mode] stays lit until the battery runs out, great for long tasks. 【Perfect Kitchen Lighting with Custom Options】Get the perfect lighting for every kitchen task and upgrade your kitchen counter decor at the same time with 3 color temperatures: Warm White (3000K) adds a cozy glow for dinner prep, Natural (4200K) suits everyday cooking, and Cool White (5700K) offers crisp clarity for chopping or cleaning. Easily switch brightness between 30%, 60%, and 100% to match your needs. The right color and brightness for each setting reduces glare and helps protect your eyes during extended kitchen use. 【Long Battery Life & Smart Charging】This 2000mAh rechargeable under cabinet lighting lasts 20-45 days in [Auto Mode] and 10 hours on MAX brightness in [Always-On Mode]. The 3-slot USB-C charging dock keeps multiple lights powered without clutter. Plus, it can charge other devices like phones and headphones, adding extra convenience. 【Remote Control & Timer Features】Easily control these under counter lights with the built-in buttons or the included remote. Set them to Always On/Off, adjust brightness, or switch between color temperatures. The remote also features a timer function with: 15, 30, 45, 60, or 120 mins, giving you flexible control over how long the wireless under cabinet lights stay on. 【Easy, Tool-Free Installation Anywhere】Our LED closet lights offers 2 installation methods: ① Use the built-in strong magnet to easily attach it to any metal surface. ② Peel off the 3M adhesive tape to stick it on any flat surface. No screws required, making installation a breeze. Perfect for cabinet, kitchens, closets, staircases, bookshelves, pantries, and more. 【We Care About You】️—EZVALO truly cares about your experience. If you have any questions, or concerns regarding our under cabinet lighting, please don’t hesitate to contact us. We’re committed to providing excellent customer service and will do everything we can to ensure your satisfaction.

name: GE LED+ Motion Sensor LED Light Bulbs, 15W, PAR38 Outdoor Security Floodlight, Warm White (2 Pack)
short_description: Simple Setup: Screw GE LED+ Motion Sensor light bulb into a fixture that fits an E26 medium base and turn on the power; light will turn on automatically when motion is detected at night - no app, hub or Wi-Fi needed! Security Light Bulb: Enhance home security with a motion sensor LED bulb by illuminating your outdoors at night - no fumbling for a light switch in the dark; wet-rated and weather-resistant for outdoor use Motion-Activated Bulb: Built with an advanced automatic motion sensor, this outdoor flood light has a 90-degree viewing angle and can detect motion within 24 feet; equivalent to a 90-watt bulb but only consumes 15 watts, all backed by GE's renowned quality Durable & Energy Efficient: With long-lasting LED technology, you can enjoy automatic on/off lighting with motion for up to 13.7 years saving up to $124 on energy bills over the bulb's lifespan; bulb turns off when no motion is detected saving you energy What-s Included: Two (2) LED+ Motion Sensor PAR38 Outdoor Flood Light Bulbs, quick start guide; Explore the rest of the LED+ Family - a simple addition to everyday light
product_description: Illuminate your space with ease and efficiency using GE LED+ Motion Sensor LED Light Bulbs. Say goodbye to fumbling for switches in the dark - our bulbs automatically detect motion, instantly flooding your room with bright, energy-efficient light. With advanced motion detection technology, our motion-sensing light bulbs activate instantly when motion is detected. Whether you're arriving home after sunset, navigating outdoor spaces, or seeking added security, our motion-activated outdoor security lights provide reliable illumination exactly when you need it. GE LED+ motion sensor outdoor light bulbs are weather-resistant and wet-rated, able to withstand the elements while delivering optimal performance. Installation is a breeze - simply screw in the motion sensor LED bulbs like any standard light bulb and let them do the rest. No complex wiring or additional equipment required, making them ideal for DIY enthusiasts and busy households alike. Boasting energy-saving features and a sleek design, these light bulbs with motion sensors not only brighten your spaces but also cut down on energy consumption and add a touch of elegance to your outdoor spaces. Our porch lights will last for years to provide reliable and consistent lighting for your indoor and outdoor spaces because of the long-lasting LED technology. Enjoy the convenience of hands-free illumination with GE LED+ Motion Sensor Light Bulb - the intelligent lighting solution that keeps your home and outdoor areas well-lit and secure.

name: MAZ-TEK Plug in Motion Sensor Dimmable Night Light, Soft Warm White LED Nightlight with Dusk to Dawn Motion Sensor, Adjustable Brightness for Bedroom, Bathroom, Kitchen, Hallway, Stairs,2 Pack
short_description: 3 BRIGHTNESS LEVELS - The motion sensor night light comes with 3 brightness levels (4/8/15 lumens). It gives the space appropriate illumination based on your choice. Controls are external facing making it easier to change the settings. 3 Lighting Modes Optional: “ON” Mode - constant on all day; "OFF" Mode-Turn off the light; “AUTO” Mode - remain OFF when ambient environment is bright enough, while turn ON automatically when motion detected at darkness within the sensing range (MAX: 12 ft., 120°) and turn off after 30 seconds of inactivity. Energy Efficient: Equipped with 4 LED light bulbs, the maximum power consumption of the night light is 0. 5 W, so it costs you less than $0.2 per year to operate (based on 11/kWh), which helps save energy and money. Available Occasions: Perfect for indoor places like stairs, garage, kitchen, hallway, bathroom, basement, corridor, cloakroom, living room, etc. to bring you and your family safety (never tripping in the dark any more) and convenience (no need to always turn on room lights). What You Receive: 2* MAZ-TEK Plug-In motion activated night lights, 1* User Manual, up to 30 Month Warranty and Lifetime Technical Support.

name: Lutron Maestro Motion Sensor Light Switch Indoor for Bathroom, Garage, Laundry Room, Any Bulbs, Occupancy Vacancy Sensor, Single-Pole, MS-OPS2-WH, White
short_description: AUTOMATIC SWITCH: Motion sensor light switch automatically turns the lights on when you enter the room and off when you leave, great for bathrooms, garages, laundry rooms, or closet light switches LUTRON MOTION SENSOR LIGHT SWITCH: Don't stress about your lights on when leaving your house. Save money by relying on the light switch to turn off for you FOCUS ON YOUR TASKS: Focus on any home projects and chores when leaving the room without worrying about turning off the lights HANDS FREE, WORRY FREE: Walk into your bathroom, garage, laundry room, and closet this motion sensor switch and lights turn on automatically MOTION LIGHT SWITCH: Senses daylight in the room and learns your preferred light level over time, so your lights stay off if it's already bright IDEAL FOR KIDS: This automatic light sensor motion ensures lights won't stay on when your kids leave the room MODE SETTINGS: Occupancy Mode (Auto ON, Auto OFF) and Vacancy Mode (Manual On, Auto Off) allows you to adjust the sensor to your needs; Programmable to delay turning off your light switch to 1, 5, 15 or 30 minutes after leaving a room
product_description: Discover the convenience of Lutron's Maestro Occupancy/Vacancy Motion Sensor Switch, perfect for enhancing home automation. This versatile switch is ideal for use in bathrooms, laundry rooms, kitchens, and garages, providing energy savings and ease of use. It is compatible with any bulb type, including CFL and LED, and seamlessly matches the entire Maestro product family line (sold separately), ensuring a cohesive look throughout your home. This sensor effortlessly integrates light automation into any room, turning lights on upon entering and off upon exiting. Program your lights to turn off 1, 5, 15, or 30 minutes after you leave, or opt for the motion sensor to operate in vacancy-only mode, turning off lights when a room is unoccupied. Installation is easy with the ground wire when no neutral is present. Coordinating Claro wall plate and accessories are available separately

name: LEONLITE COB LED Security Light, Motion Sensor Flood Lights Outdoor, Aluminum, 3 Modes Motion Detector+Dusk to Dawn+Switch Control, 100-277V, Adjustable 2-Head, IP65, 5000K Daylight, ETL, White
short_description: High-quality Motion Sensor: Equipped with a high-performance motion sensor, this security light detects movement within a 180° range and up to 59 feet away. The adjustable lamp heads allow you to direct the light where it is needed, enhancing safety without disturbing your neighbors Triple Operation Modes: Choose from three modes to fit your needs. On-Time mode offers manual control, Auto mode activates with motion at night, and Dusk-to-Dawn mode turns the light on at sunset and off at sunrise for hands-free security Durable and Lasting: Built with a sturdy aluminum body, this light is designed for durability. It resists wear, dissipates heat efficiently, and withstands sun, rain, and snow, ensuring reliable operation year-round Powerful and Versatile Illumination: With a 100-277V wide voltage range, this 25W security light delivers 2500 lumens of bright illumination, making it ideal for both residential and commercial applications Reliable Quality: This security light is ETL and FCC certified for safety and reliability. With a 50,000-hour lifespan and a 3-year warranty, you can trust it to provide long-lasting performance and peace of mind

name: Motion Sensor Light Indoor Rechargeable with Remote -Wireless Battery Powered 3 Colors Dimmable Closet Light Timing - Magnetic Mount Shower LED for Closets Stairs Pantry Porch
short_description: 6 Hours of Charging, Lasts up to 90 Days in Induction Mode: No need to buy extra batteries for this motion light indoor, the rechargeable light has a built-in high-performance 4200mAh battery that can be easily recharged via the included USB cable Rechargeable Lamp with Motion Sensor Has 3 Modes: ① "Steady" mode: the lamp always on ② "Day" mode: no matter in the bright or dark, the lamp will turn on when the human passes by ③ "Night" mode: only in the dark, the lamp will turn on when the human passes by 3 Color Temperatures, 10%-100% Adjustable Brightness: Wireless ceiling light has warm white, neutral white and cool white. Brightness can be adjusted 10%-100%, you can create different atmospheres according you needs Magnetic Mount, No Cables Required: No need holes and cables, say goodbye to the hassle of electricians! The back of the indoor motion light is magnet mounted or hook mounted Timer Function: You can control the light to turn off after 15min/30min/60min by the remote. No more fear of dark environment! Eyes Friendly: Ultra-thin ceiling light adopts 386pcs 2835 lamp beads emit even and soft light. You won't be able to see the LED chips inside even in the minimum brightness, which is very good to protect your eyes Widely Used Scenarios: The sensor light not only can be used as a ceiling light, but also a wall light. Especially suitable for closet, laundry, storage, attics, sheds, corridors, staircases, and even shower!

name: Mokot Solar Lights Outdoor, 288 LED 2800LM Motion Sensor Outdoor Light with Remote Control, 4 Heads IP65 Waterproof Solar Flood Security Lights for Outside Patio Wall -2PACK
short_description: 【Motion Sensor Outdoor Lights】The 2800LM Solar Outdoor Motion Sensor Light features high-quality LED beads that produce an extremely bright output and offer excellent heat dissipation, ensuring your nights are well-lit 【IP65 Waterproof & Easy Installation】These outdoor solar lights are made of durable materials and are IP65 waterproof, ensuring they function well even in heavy rain and snowstorms. Installation tips: ① Secure the black base to the desired location with screws, then attach the hinge arm on the back of the wall light to the base to complete the installation. ② Note that there is an exhaust hole beneath the light; it must not be installed upside down 【Remote Control & 4 Lighting Modes】The solar security lights come with a wireless remote control, enabling convenient selection of the most suitable mode: ① Long Light Mode (Half Brightness), ② Dim > Strong > Dim Mode, ③ Off > On (Strong) > Off Mode, and ④ SOS Flashing Mode 【Solar Panels & Long Working Time】Solar flood lights equipped with motion sensors feature high-efficiency solar panels and 1800mAh rechargeable batteries. They charge automatically during daylight hours and activate in low-light conditions. For optimal battery charging, please install the solar light in a location with direct sunlight 【Four Heads Wide Angle Illumination】The solar panel is adjustable to maximize sunlight absorption from every angle. The solar flood light features four adjustable light heads, a wide 270° lighting angle, and a 26-foot sensing distance, ensuring extra brightness and an extensive visible area

name: Beams MB360XT 200 Lumen Wireless Battery Operated Powered Motion Sensing LED Spotlight, 1-Pack, Brown
short_description: This next generation battery LED spotlight provides 200 lumens of bright outdoor security lighting. Its unique reflective face spreads the light to create a wider coverage area, making it ideal for large areas. The bold, durable, weatherproof design allows it to be used as a reliable outdoor spotlight. Motion activation, auto shut off and a light sensor help to prolong battery life. Expect about 1 year of light on each set of batteries with average use of 8-10 activations a day. Install the wireless, battery-powered light anywhere around the home and yard in less than 5 minutes - no electrician needed.
